posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

I'm looking to purchase T215 Red Cross, T209's (both series) and T211's. I'd like to get T215's in the SGC 30-50 range, T209's in the SGC 40 and higher grade and T211's in the SGC 30-50 range. Please e-mail me if you have examples for sale.

e-mail: [url]rare_baseballstuff@yahoo.com[/url]
